mapper.select: select t.yjid,t.yjmc,t.pyjdm from znsjcl_jg_sjyj t where t.yxbz='Y'
select t.* from znsjcl_jg_sjyj t where 1=1 and t.yjid='${svo.yjid}' and t.yxbz='Y'

select t.yjid, t2.bqmc, t.yjmc, t.pyjdm, t.yjkj, t.gjz, t.bqid, t.bz, t.yxbz, t.cjsj, t.cjr, t.yjly ywbm, t.lybm, t.gxbs from znsjcl_jg_sjyj t, znsjcl_dm_ywbq t2 where t.pyjdm in (select t1.yjid from znsjcl_jg_sjyj t1 where t1.pyjdm is null) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.bqid = t2.bqid order by t.cjsj desc

select t.*,t2.bqmc from znsjcl_jg_sjyj t,znsjcl_dm_ywbq t2 where t.yxbz='Y' and t.bqid=t2.bqid
and t.pyjdm='${svo.yjid}'
and t.yjmc LIKE '%${svo.yjmc}%'
and t2.bqmc LIKE '%${svo.bqmc}%'
mapper.insert: insert into znsjcl_jg_sjyj t (t.yjid, t.yjmc, t.pyjdm, t.yjkj, t.gjz, t.bqid, t.yxbz, t.cjsj, t.cjr) values (SJDX_INDEX.NEXTVAL, '${svo.yjmc}', '${svo.pyjdm}', '${svo.yjkj}', '${svo.gjz}', '${svo.bqid}', 'Y',sysdate, '王子琪')
mapper.update: update znsjcl_jg_sjyj t set t.yxbz='N' where t.yjid='${svo.yjid}'
update znsjcl_jg_sjyj t set t.yjmc='${svo.yjmc}',t.gjz='${svo.gjz}',t.bqid='${svo.bqid}',t.yjkj='${svo.yjkj}' where t.yjid='${svo.yjid}'
mapper.select: select t.yjkj from znsjcl_jg_sjyj t where t.yjid='${svo.yjid}'
select t.bqid id,t.bqmc text from znsjcl_dm_ywbq t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.pbqid is not null and t.pbqid!='233'
